title: Join our team "Burn in hell teemo"
body:
Hey! We are a bunch of guys (3 of us atm) who want to start a muck around ranked team. Anyone is welcome, however please have a decent attitude (no excessive flaming etc.) Our own skill levels range from bronze 5 on a bad day to high silver on a good day.

Skype would be cool but not necessary, I get nervous talking to new people..

Contact me in-game: FNG69
Cheers!

EDIT** We also play casual normals and ARAMS! :)

replies.body:
My main's on another server but i'd like to join :)
Don't know many people on this account.
but what if  i like playing teemo?
